metadata.title: Installation of Veams-Generator
metadata.contentTitle: Veams-Generator scaffolds out a new application. The Installation of Veams-Generator is easy.

articleHeader.articleH1: Veams-Generator writes your build configuration (Gruntfile, Gulpfile), pulls in relevant build tasks and packages manager dependencies (Bower, npm) that you need for your build. It bases on NodeJS and Yeoman and uses Grunt/Gulp and Bower/NPM.
